name: NetworkSlice
description: 5G Core (5GC) Network Slice resource function specification

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: userLabel
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: A user-friendly (and user assignable) name of this object

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: nSSIId
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: This RDN uniquely identifies the NetworkSliceSubnet

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: operationalState
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Operational state describes whether physically installed and working or not (ITU-T X.731)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: administrativeState
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Indicates the administrative state of the object instance (ITU-T X.731)

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: serviceProfileList
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: List of ServiceProfile supported by the network slice

resourceSpecCharacteristic.name: sst
resourceSpecCharacteristic.description: Slice/service type of the network slice (3GPP 23.501 5.15.2)
